helpers

Class ColorConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.ColorConstants

  • public final class ColorConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the Colors specifically referenced and copied by gui.mainpage.MainPageFiller and gui.popup.PopupFiller, though they are used in most of the GUI classes through parameter-passing by gui.mainpage.MainPageFiller and gui.popup.PopupFiller.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi
